a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Change in Global Hunger Index vs. population growth
– The change in global hunger index is measured over the period from 1992 to 2017.
– Population growth is measured over the period from 1992 to 2015.
Source: IFPRI 2017 Global Hunger Index, UN Population Division (2015)
Note: Downwards sloping line is line of best fit (predicted values from a linear regression)
